text:
The result of evaluating a list of conﬁgurations will be a list of tuples, each with a name
that summarizes a speciﬁc model conﬁguration and the error of the model evaluated with that
conﬁguration as either the RMSE or None if there was an error. We can ﬁlter out all scores set
to None.
# order scores
scores = [r for r in scores if r[1] != None]
Listing 11.22: Example of ﬁltering out scores for invalid conﬁgurations.
